bibl.author: taney-roger-brooke
bibl.title: Roger Brooke Taney to Prime, Ward, King & Co.

msIdentifier.collection: Record Group 53: Records of the Bureau of the Public Debt; K Series: 1833 to 1834 Stock U.S. Purchased (Reel 8), page 12

editorialDecl.p: Hold this space for succinct statements about editorial principles here and/or link to the website with more detailed editorial descriptions.

div.p: Your letter of the 29th instant inclosing certificate of transfer of $76.840 94/100 of 4 ½ per cent stock to the United States was received this morning and in reply I have the honor to inform you that as soon as the warrant for payment can be prepared it shall be forwarded to you
Interest will be allowed to the 5th of November next before which day time it is expected you will probably receive the warrant

closer.salute: I am very respy / Your obt Servt

note.p: Record Group 53: Records of the Bureau of the Public Debt; K Series: 1833 to 1834 Stock U.S. Purchased (Reel 8), page 12
The letter is subscribed as Messrs Prime, Ward, King & Co / NewYork
Copy / letter to Prime Ward / King & Co N York / 4 ½ per ct Stocks
